link.title: The Calhoun School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

li.span:
CONGRATULATIONS CALHOUN TIGERS! Calhoun defeated Barbour County 64-61 to claim 2A STATE CHAMPIONS!
Calhoun defeated Red Bay 46-30 during the Semi-finals at AHSAA in Birmingham on Monday and now they are on their way to the Finals! Lowndes County is behind you All the way!

div.a: Lowndes County BOE Head Start Recruitment 2020-2021

div.div: Head Start 2020-2021 Recruitment Flyer Folleto de reclutamiento Head Start 2020-2021

February 28, 2020, the Calhoun Varsity Boys' Basketball team defeated Barbour County High School to secure the 2A State Basketball Championship. This is Calhoun's first title in 17 years but our Tigers are posed to bring home the championship in 2021.

p.strong: Lowndes County Public Schools Notice of Non-discrimination

The Lowndes County Public Schools System does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:

Darryl Washington
Title IX Coordinator
504 Coordinator
80 Commerce Street South
Hayneville, Alabama 36040
334-548-2131-Office
334-548-2161- Fax
email: dwashington@lowndesboe.org
